column5: Could someone shoot me some info. on the English River North of Kenora? Quality of fishing? Best areas? Methods?
look at the seperation lake postingsthis is the same placejust a widening of the river system

How for north of Kenora? I like Press Lake near Ignace. It's part of the English River system. < www.presslake.on.ca >"An angler is a man who spends rainy days sitting around on the muddy banks of rivers doing nothing because his wife won't let him do it at home." --- Irish saying

Hi there!The Lake of the Woods Tourism association in Northern Ontario has the most up-to-date info on the lodges on the English River North of Kenora. Check us out at: www.lakeofthewoods.com or call at 1-800-535-4549
